answer:

   â€¢ â° Late - Student came late

question: When can I mark attendance
answer:
Attendance marking rules â°

â€¢ Today's attendance: Can only mark AFTER the batch start time
â€¢ Yesterday's attendance: Can mark anytime (for corrections)
â€¢ Future dates: Cannot mark
â€¢ Past dates (before yesterday): Cannot mark

ğŸ’¡ The system prevents marking attendance before batch time to ensure accuracy!
